00021 #ifndef FX2MACROS_H
00022 #define FX2MACROS_H
00023 
00024 #include "fx2regs.h"
00025 #include "fx2types.h"
00026 
00027 #define MSB(addr) (BYTE)((addr >> 8) & 0xff)
00028 #define LSB(addr) (BYTE)(addr & 0xff)
00029 #define MAKEWORD(msb,lsb) (((WORD)msb << 8) | lsb)
00030 
00031 #define MSW(dword) (WORD)((dword >> 16) & 0xffff)
00032 #define LSW(dword) (WORD)(dword & 0xffff)
00033 #define MAKEDWORD(msw,lsw) (((DWORD)msw << 16) | lsw)
00034 
00035 // clock stuff
00036 
00040 typedef enum { CLK_12M =0, CLK_24M, CLK_48M} CLK_SPD;
00041 
00045 #define CPUFREQ (CLK_SPD)((CPUCS & bmCLKSPD) >> 3)
00046 
00050 #define SETCPUFREQ(SPD) CPUCS = (CPUCS & ~bmCLKSPD) | (SPD << 3)
00051 
00063 #define XTAL (CPUFREQ==CLK_12M ? 12000000L :\
00064               CPUFREQ==CLK_24M ? 24000000L : 48000000L)
00065 
00066 
00077 #define I2CFREQ ((I2CTL & bm400KHZ) ? 400000L : 100000L)
00078 
00079 
00080 #define IFFREQ (IFCONFIG & bm3048MHZ ? 48000000L : 30000000L)
00081 #define SETIF30MHZ() IFCONFIG &= ~bm3048MHZ
00082 #define SETIF48MHZ() IFCONFIG |= bm3048MHZ
00083 
00084 
00085 // eeprom stuff
00086 #define EEPROM_TWO_BYTE (I2CS & bmBIT4)
00087 
00099 #define RENUMERATE_UNCOND() USBCS|=bmDISCON|bmRENUM;delay(1500);USBCS&=~bmDISCON
00100 
00104 #define RENUMERATE() if(!(USBCS&bmRENUM)) {USBCS|=bmDISCON|bmRENUM;delay(1500);USBCS &= ~bmDISCON;}
00105

00116 #define HISPEED (USBCS&bmHSM)

00119 
00120 
00124 #define REMOTE_WAKEUP() (((WAKEUPCS & bmWU) && (WAKEUPCS & bmWUEN)) || ((WAKEUPCS & bmWU2) && (WAKEUPCS & bmWU2EN)))
